channel.title: In need of a model compressor
channel.description:
Hello everyone,
My normal RS model Compressor works fine but i was fucking around with some models and thought it was funny to compress 42k items :) clearly it is to much what my compressor can handle. Anyone knows where i can increase the max stuff or does anyone got a better one?

item.title: In need of a model compressor
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Yesteryear:

Models are compressed with GZIP fyi.

Not mine.
I put all the .dat files in a folder called models.
Then i run the compressor they put it in models.idx and models.dat

Read full topic
item.source: In need of a model compressor
